interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: My Favorite Martian: Season 2
Review Date: 2016/02/18
Store: Ray Waltson  (Actor),     Bill Bixby  (Actor),     John L. Greene (creator)  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Indie & Art House
Product Description: ["MY FAVORITE MARTIAN marked the beginning of television's fascination with fantasy themed comedy series, originally airing on CBS-TV from 1963 to 1966 before being relaunched as a motion picture in 1999. Debuting in the top ten upon it's premiere season, MY FAVORITE MARTIAN stars Bill Bixby (THE COURTSHIP OF EDDIE'S FATHER, THE INCREDIBLE HULK) as newspaper reporter Tim O'Hara and Ray Walston (PICKET FENCES) as the Martian whom Tim discovers and passes off as his Uncle Martin. Pamela Britton plays their snoopy landlady, Lorelei Brown. MY FAVORITE MARTIAN Season Two Collector's Edition presents 38 complete, digitally remastered episodes along with special features. Among other classic TV actors who make guest appearances are Linda Evans, David White, Stafford Rebb, Pat Priest, Michael Constantine, Marge Redmond, Doris Packer, and Bernie Kopell."]
Average Rating: 4.3

Movies & TV, Indie & Art House
["MY FAVORITE MARTIAN marked the beginning of television's fascination with fantasy themed comedy series, originally airing on CBS-TV from 1963 to 1966 before being relaunched as a motion picture in 1999. Debuting in the top ten upon it's premiere season, MY FAVORITE MARTIAN stars Bill Bixby (THE COURTSHIP OF EDDIE'S FATHER, THE INCREDIBLE HULK) as newspaper reporter Tim O'Hara and Ray Walston (PICKET FENCES) as the Martian whom Tim discovers and passes off as his Uncle Martin. Pamela Britton plays their snoopy landlady, Lorelei Brown. MY FAVORITE MARTIAN Season Two Collector's Edition presents 38 complete, digitally remastered episodes along with special features. Among other classic TV actors who make guest appearances are Linda Evans, David White, Stafford Rebb, Pat Priest, Michael Constantine, Marge Redmond, Doris Packer, and Bernie Kopell."]

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference**: Strong interest in classic fantasy-themed comedy series and television shows, particularly from the mid-20th century.
- **Purchase Format**: Favors physical media formats, specifically DVDs, suggesting a preference for collector's editions and high-quality presentations.
- **Critical Acclaim**: Tends to rate products highly, evidenced by a 5-star review, indicating a positive reception of content and possibly a preference for nostalgia-driven entertainment.
- **Genres**: Shows a clear affinity for indie and art house categories within the realm of movies and television, alongside a distinct appreciation for unique and offbeat storytelling.
- **Media Consumption**: Engages with iconic actors and creators from classic television, highlighting a preference for established content over contemporary offerings.
- **Review Behavior**: Minimalist review style, offering simple affirmations rather than detailed critiques, suggesting contentment with purchased items while valuing clarity in feedback.

Overall, this user appears to be a classic television enthusiast, primarily interested in high-quality, nostalgia-inducing comedies with a preference for physical media collections.
